name: Mosey chronicles
description:
This is a first game, and it is simple and short.  In this plataformer, you play as a pastafarian pirate called Mosey, for pirates are His chosen people. You must save the drag queens who are in danger, with the help of the Noodly Highness Himself!

This is the first level of a total of 4, with the later ones still in development.
